title: Good or Bad in Context
text: A low percentile means that that a student got less points while a high percentile means that a student got more points.

title: Good or Bad in Context
text: In context, since this assesses accuracy, is it better to have a lower percentile (getting less points on the assignment) or have a higher percentile (getting more points on the assignment)?

title: Determining if 80th Percentile is Good or Bad
text: Since it is better to have a higher percentile (scoring more answers correct), is having a high percentile such as $$80$$ (greater than 50) relatively a good thing or a bad thing?
